type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.DependencyResolutionListener
type.description: * A {@code DependencyResolutionListener} is notified as dependencies are resolved.

method.name: afterResolve
method.description: * This method is called immediately after a set of dependencies are resolved. * * @param dependencies The set of dependencies resolved.

method.name: beforeResolve
method.description: * This method is called immediately before a set of dependencies are resolved. * * @param dependencies The set of dependencies to be resolved.
